name: Nefarious Night of Necromancy Builder Mode
name_original: Nefarious Night of Necromancy Builder Mode
description:
Overview

It's a lonely life, spending all your time in a graveyard.  As a gravedigger on a quest for company you’ve decided to take matters into your own hands.  Assemble your tools and harvest the last 5 organs you need from the recently deceased to create the ultimate Frankenstein monster. You  can create buildings now as well!

Goal

The player’s main objective to search the graves of people that have been recently buried in order to harvest their organs. The goal is to build the best Frankenstein monster. You can also now build things!

Gameplay

Collect parts from around the graveyard to assemble tools to enhance your grave robbing skills.  Dig up graves to collect unused organs from recently buried corpses. Create the ultimate Frankenstein’s Monster. Also you can create structures!
